Cleaning up and rebuilding after a wildfire is an important step in protecting against future disaster. I am proud to support legislation that will bring aid to communities like Utah County that have been affected by catastrophic natural disasters. #utpol https://kutv.com/news/local/rep-curtis-advocates-for-utahs-forests-funding-for-emergency-watershed-program¬†‚Ä¶

In the state of Utah alone, nearly half a million acres burned last year. I am proud to support #HR2157's Amendment 9 that will bring aid to communities that have been affected by catastrophic natural disasters. #utpol pic.twitter.com/AeFYBzuK62

To read my full remarks at the @NatResources hearing and to learn more about the bill, click here: https://curtis.house.gov/press-releases/after-tragic-2018-forest-fires-curtis-introduces-bill-to-restore-health-and-resiliency/¬†‚Ä¶

Yesterday I was proud to join my good friend @RepWesterman in introducing the ‚ÄúResilient Federal Forests Act.‚Äù This bill provides the types of fire prevention tools needed to restore health to our nation‚Äôs forests, while also empowering important community safety efforts. #utpol

The poor health of our nation‚Äôs forests has reached crisis levels. Before our own eyes, we‚Äôve seen many of our nation‚Äôs once flourishing forests transform into dead and burned out waste lands. 2018 was an especially deadly and destructive year. #utpol pic.twitter.com/zadpodpE27

In the third quarter of 2018, the Utah economy grew at an annual rate of 4.4% and in February 2019, the unemployment rate was 3%, down from 3.1% in February 2018. Thank you Utah small businesses! We celebrate all that you do to build our communities stronger and more vibrant!

Data clearly shows small businesses are at the forefront of economic growth. Small businesses added 24,549 net new jobs during the last year studied. There are 287,803 small businesses in Utah, and they employ 46.2 percent of the states private workforce! pic.twitter.com/44u2vL062K
It‚Äôs Small Business Week and I‚Äôm proud to support the hard work, creativity, and passion of small business owners in Utah‚Äôs Third District. #SmallBusinessWeek pic.twitter.com/WwGdMYaQWU

I did‚Äî twice. https://twitter.com/repjohncurtis/status/1124059726898184192?s=21¬†‚Ä¶

Twice, I offered an amendment that would bring transparency to the emissions produced by all countries in the agreement‚Äîboth times it was shot down on a partisan basis. Only 3 Republican amendments were considered compared to the 26 Democrat amendments that were debated. (2/2)

I want to ensure our efforts actually improve the environment, avoid damaging our economy, and are based on facts, not politics. #utpol #HFAC #HR9 #ClimateActionNowAct (1/2) https://curtis.house.gov/press-releases/curtis-votes-against-ineffective-and-economically-damaging-hr-9/¬†‚Ä¶

I cannot vote for HR 9 because I believe it drives us further apart‚Äîreinforcing a false narrative that all Republicans don‚Äôt care about the environment because they are unwilling to get on board w/an all-or-nothing, unrealistic approach to addressing climate change. (3/3) #utpol

üîπthat the US already is #1 in reducing greenhouse gas + has the largest absolute decline among all countries since 2000
üîπthe fact that if the US cut their CO2 emissions to zero, it would not come even close to offsetting the emissions coming from the rest of the world (2/3)

An all-or-nothing, unrealistic approach to addressing climate change, #HR9 ignores:

üîπserious & legitimate concerns about cost/effectiveness of Paris Agreement
üîπthat Obama's pledge could cost the US $250 billion dollars and nearly 3 million jobs in the next six years (1/3) https://twitter.com/RepJohnCurtis/status/1123682529075236866¬†‚Ä¶

The theme for this year's National Day of Prayer is "Love One Another." Prayer is something we clearly need in our country. Today we can come together as a nation to pray for love for each other and for peace around the world. #utpol #NationalDayOfPrayer pic.twitter.com/NOm2pJASy1

It was great to meet as a delegation this morning with @GovHerbert in DC to discuss issues that are important to all of our constituents. #utpol pic.twitter.com/gcF23DLvhd ‚Äì at Longworth House Office Building

Let‚Äôs continue leading the world in bettering our environment‚Äîbut let‚Äôs not pretend that #HR9 is the silver bullet to our evolving world. It‚Äôs time to stop with the easy, cheap rhetoric that offers false promises and divides our country even further. MORE: https://curtis.house.gov/press-releases/rep-curtis-on-hr-9-climate-action-now-act-what-kind-of-leadership-leads-to-double-digit-unemployment-in-rural-america-but-lets-china-off-the-hook/¬†‚Ä¶

I agree that America must continue to show leadership. But let‚Äôs focus on leadership that goes back to the core principles of innovation, conservation, adaptation, and preparation. #HR9 fails to do any of that.

I‚Äôve heard over and over that the US must remain in the Paris Agreement to ‚Äúshow leadership.‚Äù What kind of leadership leads to double-digit unemployment in rural America but lets China off the hook? #HFAC #utpol pic.twitter.com/rjwVOiFUVW
